channel.title: General
channel.description: General topics relating to UnWheel. Post your suggestions, questions and comments here.

item.title: UnWheel2 Demo Finally Released
item.author: invalid@example.com (stevenhorton)
item.dc:creator: stevenhorton
item.content:encoded:
Here is the link;
http://www.indiedb.com/engines/unreal-development-kit/downloads/unwheel2-demo

Steven

item.title: Does anybody have the old UnWheel installers?
item.author: invalid@example.com (RacingCoyote)
item.dc:creator: RacingCoyote
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone,

I wanted to show my kids the original UnWheel game but the installer packages are unavailable from the original UnWheel download page.

Does anybody have an alternative link where I can get them?

Thanks!

item.title: UnWheel 2 in UDK
item.author: invalid@example.com (stevenhorton)
item.dc:creator: stevenhorton
item.content:encoded:
I have been working on porting UnWheel 2 into UDK for the last several months.
The speedometer HUD refuses to work in UDK, but the rest does.

I have the cooked stand alone,( does not require UT3), but it only includes the Monaco map. http://www.mediafire.com/file/zzzwhmtfj1q/UDK-UnWheel2.exe

The uncooked is in two .zips; the first includes all necessary files and Monaco, the second the remaining 4 maps....

UnWheel 2 in UDK

item.title: flyaway map?
item.author: invalid@example.com (dbuske)
item.dc:creator: dbuske
item.content:encoded: What happened to the Unwheel flyaway map? I cannot find it.

item.title: Congratulations Steven!
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProjectX)
item.dc:creator: ProjectX
item.content:encoded: Enjoy your $500, you've certainly earned it!

item.title: UnWheel 2 in Grand Finals
item.author: invalid@example.com (stevenhorton)
item.dc:creator: stevenhorton
item.content:encoded:
I just uploaded UnWheel2 to Epic's MSUC ftp with the current version of UnWheel 2!

New additions include: Simple lap time recorder,
Mouse steering,
Speed indicator,
Six speed transmissions,
New engine sounds,
Cars will now slide around corners,
New map, makes three total....

UnWheel 2 in Grand Finals

item.title: UnWheel 2 is a MSUC Phase 4 Finalist
item.author: invalid@example.com (stevenhorton)
item.dc:creator: stevenhorton
item.content:encoded:
This is a surprise to me! I entered in 6 categorys; Best Non-FPS Game Mod
Best Art for Game Mod
Best Mod Level
Best New Vehicle Set
Best Graphics in Map...

UnWheel 2 is a MSUC Phase 4 Finalist

item.title: How to add a simulator plugin?
item.author: invalid@example.com (sirnoname)
item.dc:creator: sirnoname
item.content:encoded:
Hey,

InMotion has build a HW simulator for Unwheel.
Can someone tell me how I can contact the Unwheel autors to add such a plugin to our simulator community www.x-simulator.de ?
Would be nice if we can do such a trick.

Best regards
SirNoName

item.title: 3D Ripper DX
item.author: invalid@example.com (NeoNautica)
item.dc:creator: NeoNautica
item.content:encoded:
A friend showed me this cool app that can pull whatever is drawn on screen and dump it in a 3D file that can be opened in max/maya:

http://www.deep-shadows.com/hax/3DRipperDX.htm

Been using it too look at the cars in GRID and will probably get Burnout for PC to look at their cars. Awesome tool for learning how stuff was made in a PC game

item.author: invalid@example.com (JACK SH!T)
item.dc:creator: JACK SH!T
item.content:encoded: where the hell is everyone????

item.title: Well done Steve!
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProjectX)
item.dc:creator: ProjectX
item.content:encoded:
His test/demo map for UnWheel 2 got him an honorary mention for best graphics in a map in phase 2 of the MSUC!

Congratulations!


Full story:
http://www.beyondunreal.com/view_story.php?id=12411

item.title: Beta Release Close
item.author: invalid@example.com (stevenhorton)
item.dc:creator: stevenhorton
item.content:encoded: I built a map in order to cook the UnWheel2 vehicles for submission into the MSU contest, here are 3 screenshots. In order to enter the vehicles, they muct be released to the community, so keep watch for the release

item.title: UnWheel Soundtrack - Artist?
item.author: invalid@example.com (_Radon)
item.dc:creator: _Radon
item.content:encoded:
Hi there

Might sound a bit strange, but is there a way to get more tracks/albums of the nameless artist, whose tracks i found in unwheel?

For example
Resistor, Sedated, Plenty of your kind, etc i think you know who i mean ^^

i think they are pretty cool, but i had no chance to find anything about them in the internet or in this board.

Would be great to find more about them with your help

item.title: UnWheel2's New Talent!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (stevenhorton)
item.dc:creator: stevenhorton
item.content:encoded:
I would like to officially announce two new UnWheel2 members;

kea

Status: Working
RL name: A. Popov
RL occupation: Student and C# programmer
Country: Ukraine
Year of birth: 1985
Web site: http://www.unreal.lone-wolfs-den.com/SP2D/index.html
"I would like to make AI improvements to UnWheel and gametypes stuff".


jayo

Well, my name is Opeyemi Ajayi (friends call me "jayo" - due to being unable to pronounce my African name ). Was raised in my home country...

UnWheel2's New Talent!!

item.title: UnWheel for UT3
item.author: invalid@example.com ([VaLkyR]Anubis)
item.dc:creator: [VaLkyR]Anubis
item.content:encoded:
Hi folks,

As the title it says,I wanna ask you guys if you are working on the UnWheel mod for UT3 (already) Or do you plan to make the mod and plan your ideas and the other things,just curious,I liked the mod for UT2004 and now,where UT3 has such high power and beauty,there are some very nice things possible,isn't it.=]

item.title: AI seemingly broken
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dracion)
item.dc:creator: Dracion
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I recently downloaded this mod on the recommendation of a friend, however, whenever I play on practice, the AI never seems to work properly. The bots always seem to get stuck, or try to crash into one another. Is there any way to fix this, or is this just a common place bug.

I'm using the UT2004 version of the mod.

Thanks, Dracion

item.title: Sound familiar?
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProjectX)
item.dc:creator: ProjectX
item.content:encoded:
Ok, so a recent jam-session with muse and The Streets was leaked onto the interwebs (muse are fine with it, so this is all legal). It's been called "London Rap" (I honestly don't know anyone who speaks like this) and I think it sounds quite unbelievably like some of Strangelet's music he did for UnWheel.

What do you think? http://www.xfm.co.uk/news/2008/muse-and-streets-collaboration-leaked

item.title: Old School
item.author: invalid@example.com (JACK SH!T)
item.dc:creator: JACK SH!T
item.content:encoded:
I would like to know who's still hanging around. I'm starting to get the itch to pimp UW2. I don't have UT3 yet, but was thinking (k, insert joke here...), what if a new map pack was made for UW1 to show off some of the new fetchers? Just 2-3 maps & cars to generate interest. The fist map pack was a hit! I'll put it together, but I don't know how to convert any UW2 maps back to 2004. Stormblade might.... StevenHorton, let's get this going. It's one of the few mods that still has any life in...

Old School

item.title: Lol.
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProjectX)
item.dc:creator: ProjectX
item.content:encoded:
Looks like someone else has decided that that K-Ball thingy we came up with is a great gametype, just wish we'd get a cut from it

http://www.ps3fanboy.com/2008/08/08...-rocket-powered-battle-cars-races-towards-ps/
